short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays how many minutes you have until your next reviews in WaniKani.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays the number of minutes until your next reviews in WaniKani. You can also click on the extension to take you directly to your review session.

Source code is on GitHub: https://github.com/klistwan/wanikani-notifications

If you have any issues, please contact me by e-mail at konrad.listwan@gmail.com or on Twitter at @klistwan
